attributes.action: MPs contracts to deliver '7 day service' - 24 hour, 7 days a week
attributes.background: In light of the contract likely to be imposed on junior doctors our politicians should be expected to adhere to the same deal, to help deliver a safer democracy.

rejection.details:
MPs do not have a contract of employment or contractual hours. We're therefore not sure what action you would like to be taken. 

If you would like the sitting hours of the House of Commons to be changed, you could start a petition asking for that.
